participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: responsible and dedicated, he values family and stability.
participant_1.background: i own a house in florida. i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years. i have a children and a dogs. i'm a male.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: energetic and ambitious, always looking to improve her game.
participant_2.background: my family is continuously growing. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm a professional tennis player. i'm married to a doctor. i live in a three storey house.

content.text: i have a dog , but i do not have any pets
